footer.warranty: For designated models of Xiaomi smartphone, you can enjoy the warranty services for your device at designated Xiaomi.
footer.warranty2: Customers should provide a valid purchase proof and warranty card. After inspected by the Xiaomi authorized service center and confirmed that the smartphone meets warranty conditions, you can enjoy the in-warranty service for free. Warranty determination rules are subject to the local service center.
